originalText.text: I've had the pleasure of working with Steve and Giglio Co for a number of years now and thoroughly value the service and commitment I've received.  Steve goes the extra mile to invest in my relationship and success.  Working together, we've achieved numerous new milestones in both sales and executive leadership.  I would recommend Steve to any of my professional colleagues or peers seeking an executive coach who cares and knows how to get the job one.  Thanks Steve!

originalText.text:
Steve’s guidance and trainings have been fundamental in my professional growth.
As someone in the marketing and communication field, his message on the importance of actively and effectively listening has been crucial in my continued development.

originalText.text: Steve Giglio hosted several sales training seminars for my sales team over the course of a few years. He was engaging, passionate, patient and effective with many takeaways for the team and myself. Highly recommend his training programs for executives and business development managers.

text.text: Steve Giglio hosted several sales training seminars for my sales team over the course of a few years. He was engaging, passionate, patient and effective with many takeaways for the team and myself. Highly recommend his training programs for executives and business development managers.

originalText.text: Steve is excellent at his job of providing coaching, mentoring, planning, strategy, messaging for both executive and sales development objectives.  I have been working with Steve for over 7 years, and I still find tremendous value in our sessions together.  In addition, Steve has worked with others within our firm to drive top line performance and business development programs, with great success.

originalText.text: Steve is a world-class expert at helping executives develop their leadership muscles and also working with their teams on key skills like communication and collaboration.  Steve has had a huge impact on my own development and that of my teams.
